sourcesContent:
<template>
  <b-container>
    <!-- 默认为灰色，长方形 -->
    <b-badge class="mr-1">
      Default badge
    </b-badge>
    <!-- badge也可以选择类型来变成不同的样式 -->
    <b-badge variant="success" class="mr-1">
      Success badge
    </b-badge>
    <b-badge variant="primary" class="mr-1">
      Primary badge
    </b-badge>
    <b-badge variant="danger" class="mr-1">
      Danger badge
    </b-badge>
    <hr />
    <!-- 下面使用pill让他变成药丸形状 -->
    <b-badge pill class="mr-1">
      124
    </b-badge>
  </b-container>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {

    }
  },
  methods: {

  }
}
</script>
